general.select_character: Select one or multiple characters to place this bet
general.tooltip_category: Select one or multiple categories you want to bet one
general.tooltip_select_coin: Select a project you want to bet on. Only one project per category is selectable
general.tooltip_extra_coin: Pay additional DCT to get one extra project to bet on
general.tooltip_extra_leverage: Pay additional DCT to get one extra leverage selection
general.tooltip_your_position: Short position: Betting a security's price will decline. Long position: Expecting the price will rise.
general.tooltip_bet: Select the DCT amount you want to bet on this position. The amount next to it indicates how much DCT you have left to spend on other categories for this game. Click Place Bet to lock in your bet. This is changeable anytime until the Soft Deadline ends
general.burn_tooltip_text: By doing this you will spend:
general.select_correct_character: Select correct character on the left to play.
general.tooltip_entry_fee: Amount of DCT you have to pay to enter the Arena Game. The same amount will also be your spendable balance of DCT to bet on different categories.
general.tooltip_prizepool: Amount of Dollars in ETH which will be distributed to the top winner of the game.
general.tooltip_leaderboard_bets: After the Soft Deadline is reached, players can see their own bets here.
general.tooltip_reveal_bets: Pay additional DCT to reveal what the selected player bets on.
general.tooltip_status:
Open: Arena Game is open and can be entered by paying the entry fee. Place your bets before the soft deadline ends
Soft: Soft Deadline is reached. Further bets are only allowed by spending extra DCT
Hard: Hard Deadline is reached. No more bets allowed
general.select_character_popup: Choose one or several character toplay this game

cookies.copy: We use cookies to ensure the proper functioning of the website and to improve your experience. You can manage them by clicking on “adjust settings“. See the Cookie Policy for more information.

items.title: Cookies required
items.copy: The necessary cookies provide essential functionality. A website without cookies cannot function properly and can only be turned off by changing your browser settings.

items.title: Analytical cookies
items.copy: Analytical cookies help us improve our website by collecting and reporting data on its use.

items.title: Marketing cookies
items.copy: We use marketing cookies to improve the relevance of the campaigns you receive.

content.documentContent:
Adware is a form of spyware that records a user's web-surfing habits and displays advertisements targeted to their interests. Adware is sometimes offered in exchange for 'free' services, such as music downloads. Some common virus signposts include:

  • files and data have been deleted or file names are changed
  • the computer takes longer to load programs or applications or web pages
  • the computer takes longer to boot, continually restarts or does not start at all
  • frequent system or program crashes.

Data subject rights list

  1. Right of access (GDPR Article 15).
  2. Right to rectification (GDPR Article 16).
  3. Right to erasure or right to be forgotten with additional stipulations, among others, if personal data has been made public (GDPR Article 17).
  4. Right to restriction of processing (GDPR Article 18).
  5. Right to be informed (GDPR Article 19).
  6. Right to data portability (GDPR Article 20).
  7. Right to object (GDPR Article 21).
  8. Right not to be subject to a decision based solely on automated processing, including profiling, which produces legal effects concerning him or her or similarly significantly affects him or her (GDPR Article 22).

      9. Child Online Africa

      Links:

      • Exposure to Inappropriate Content (Animation)
      • Manage your Screen Time (Animation)
      • Right to Play Online (Animation)
      • Right to Use Digital Media (Animation)
      • Online with Sango: A Story Book for Children
      • Workbook with Sango Including Agenda 2040 and the African Charter
content.documentContentSecond:
Talk to a social worker specialised in child protection by phone, email or by Free online live chat. Free 24/7.

https://childlinett.org/https://web.facebook.com/TTChildLine?_rdc=1&_rdr
https://www.instagram.com/childline_tt/
https://twitter.com/childline_tt

iOS app: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id1532546624
